sn47.42:1.4: L’origine del corpo avviene con l’origine del cibo/nutrimento.
sn47.42:1.8:
L’origine del cuore/mente** avviene con l’origine di mente/intelletto e corpo/fisico***.               
 >> SN 12.2   /// mente & corpo// nāma = cetanā, sañña, etc. // Based on our ignorance of higher happiness, we determine cetanā: the intention to pursuit lower forms of happiness, we fixate the mind on it (manasikāra), we identify (sañña) the sources of pleasure (vedanā), and we seek contact with them (phassa), which we then experience with the body (rūpa)
